net.sf.sahi.client
Class SingleBrowserMultiScriptHelper

java.lang.Object
  net.sf.sahi.client.SingleBrowserMultiScriptHelper

public class SingleBrowserMultiScriptHelper
extends java.lang.Object

Helper class that exposes methods to launch a browser, execute scripts in the browser and to kill the browser.

Constructor Summary
SingleBrowserMultiScriptHelper(java.lang.String sahiHost, java.lang.String sahiPort, java.lang.String browserType)
          A new object should be created for a full set of openBrowser, executeScript, executeScript..., killBrowser calls

Constructor Detail

SingleBrowserMultiScriptHelper

public SingleBrowserMultiScriptHelper(java.lang.String sahiHost,
                                      java.lang.String sahiPort,
                                      java.lang.String browserType)
A new object should be created for a full set of openBrowser, executeScript, executeScript..., killBrowser calls

Parameters:
sahiHost - Machine name or IP address where Sahi server runs. Typically this will be localhost
sahiPort - Port where Sahi server runs. Typically this will be 9999
browserType - Type of browser to launch. This should match the name in browserType node in browser_types.xml
Method Detail

setScriptExecutionTimeout

public void setScriptExecutionTimeout(long timeoutInMillis)
executeScript calls will wait for a max timeout to be deemed complete. Use setScriptExecutionTimeout to set this timeout value. By default, it is 10 minutes.

Parameters:
timeoutInMillis - Max timeout specified in milliseconds

getScriptExecutionTimeout

public long getScriptExecutionTimeout()
Returns the script execution timeout

Returns:
Script execution timeout

setLogDebugMessages

public void setLogDebugMessages(boolean logDebugMessages)
Decides whether to log debug messages

Parameters:
logDebugMessages - Pass true to log debug messages.

getLogDebugMessages

public boolean getLogDebugMessages()
Returns whether debug messages will be logged

Returns:
true if debug messages will be logged, else false

launchBrowser

public boolean launchBrowser(java.lang.String startUrl)
Launches the browser of type browserType passed in the constructor.

Parameters:
startUrl - Start url to be launched in the browser
Returns:
true if the browser was launched successfully, false otherwise.

executeScript

public boolean executeScript(java.lang.String scriptsDir,
                             java.lang.String scriptsRelativeFilePath,
                             java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> inputParams)
Executes a given test script.

Parameters:
scriptsDir - Full physical path to the userdata/scripts folder. Example: D:/SahiPro502/userdata/scripts
scriptsRelativeFilePath - Path of the script file relative to the userdata/scripts folder
inputParams - Map containing input parameters as key value pairs
Returns:
true if the script was completed within the max timeout with no errors, else false.

executeScript

public boolean executeScript(java.lang.String dir,
                             java.lang.String file)

killBrowser

public void killBrowser()
Kills the opened browser.
